assignUser commented on code in PR #13149:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13149#discussion_r872567418


##########
r/R/install-arrow.R:
##########
@@ -113,7 +113,7 @@ arrow_repos <- function(repos = getOption("repos"), nightly = FALSE) {
     # Set the default/CDN
     repos <- "https://cloud.r-project.org/"
   }
-  dev_repo <- getOption("arrow.dev_repo", "https://arrow-r-nightly.s3.amazonaws.com")
+  dev_repo <- getOption("arrow.dev_repo", "https://nightly.wujciak.de/r")

Review Comment:
   revert before merge



##########
r/tools/nixlibs.R:
##########
@@ -19,7 +19,7 @@ args <- commandArgs(TRUE)
 VERSION <- args[1]
 dst_dir <- paste0("libarrow/arrow-", VERSION)
 
-arrow_repo <- "https://arrow-r-nightly.s3.amazonaws.com/libarrow/"
+arrow_repo <- "https://nightly.wujciak.de/r/libarrow/"

Review Comment:
   revert before merge

assignUser commented on code in PR #13149:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13149#discussion_r872567616


##########
r/tools/winlibs.R:
##########
@@ -38,7 +38,7 @@ if (!file.exists(sprintf("windows/arrow-%s/include/arrow/api.h", VERSION))) {
       )
     }
     # URL templates
-    nightly <- "https://arrow-r-nightly.s3.amazonaws.com/libarrow/bin/windows/arrow-%s.zip"
+    nightly <- "https://nightly.wujciak.de/r/libarrow/bin/windows/arrow-%s.zip"

Review Comment:
   revert before merge
